resources.string: Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, ir nepieciešams viens vai vairāki Google Play pakalpojumi, kas pašlaik nav pieejami. Lai saņemtu palīdzību, lūdzu, sazinieties ar izstrādātāju.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, ir jāiespējo Google Play pakalpojumi.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, tālrunī ir jāinstalē Google Play pakalpojumi.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, planšetdatorā ir jāinstalē Google Play pakalpojumi.
Norādītais konts šajā ierīcē nepastāv. Lūdzu, izvēlieties citu kontu.
Lai izveidotu savienojumu ar Google Play pakalpojumiem, ir nepieciešams datu savienojums.
Piekļuve kontiem no ierobežota profila netiek atbalstīta.
Pierakstoties norādītajā kontā, radās kļūda. Lūdzu, izvēlieties citu kontu.
Lietotnē %1$s ir radusies problēma ar Google Play pakalpojumu darbību. Ja problēma joprojām pastāv, lūdzu, sazinieties ar izstrādātāju.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, ir jāinstalē Google Play pakalpojumi, taču tie jūsu ierīcē netiek atbalstīti. Sazinieties ar ražotāju, lai saņemtu palīdzību.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, ir jāatjaunina Google Play pakalpojumi.
Lai lietotne %1$s darbotos, ir jāinstalē Google Play pakalpojumi. Pašlaik notiek to atjaunināšana.
Ir nepieciešama jauna Google Play pakalpojumu versija. Drīzumā tā tiks instalēta.
Press the band for 1s to stop alarm
Long press the band to stop alarm

Android versijai jābūt 4.4 vai uz augšu
Tālrunim jāatbalsta Bluetooth versja 4.0 vai jaunāka

"ĶMI: svars (kg) / augums (m) kvadrātā.
Jūs nevar novērtēt vai jūs esat \ "aptaukojies \" tikai ar ĶMI vērtību. Ar standarta ĶMI, cilvēkiem ar vairāk tauku un mazāk muskuļu joprojām var būt aptaukošanās. "
Jūsu ķermeņa tauku attiecība ir normāla
ĶMI tagad ir augsts, taču nav pieejama ķermeņa tauku datu analizē. ĶMI šeit ir tikai atsauce
Pašreizējais ĶMI ir pārāk zems, un nav labs jūsu veselībai. Jums ir nepieciešams, lai uzlabotu dzīves stilu, vairāk ēst un vairāk kustēties, lai saglabātu formu
Pašreizējā ĶMI ir pārāk zems. Jums ir nepieciešams pievērst uzmanību svara izmaiņām, uzlabot dzīves stilu, saglabāt sabalansētu uzturu, un uzturēt regulāru darbu un atpūtu
Jūsu ĶMI pārsniedz robežu (%s), tāpēc nav ķermeņa tauku attiecība. Jums ir nepieciešams vairāk kustēties.

"\"Vielmaiņa\" refers to the lowest energy required to maintain basic life activities. Basal metabolic rate is decided by how much energy consumed by muscle mass. People with higher basal metabolic rate doesn't gain weight easily.
You can keep fit and balanced intake of meat, fish, soy products and dairy products to increase muscle mass."
Tavs metabolisma līmenis ir %d Kal, cilvēki ar zemu bazālās vielmaiņas ātrumu, visticamāk, pieņēmās svarā un jūtas noguruši, mēģiniet staigāt pēc ēdienreizes un skriet vienu reizi nedēļā.
Your body fat ratio is low. Fat is an important part of cells and nervous system, excessive reduction of body fat can cause endocrine disorders.
Too many body fat, please pay attention to diet and do more exercises to keep healthy.
Your standard body fat ratio range should be %1$s~%2$s, still need to lose %3$s fat.
Your standard body fat ratio range should be %1$s~%2$s. Current body fat ratio is high, you need to keep balanced diet, improve life style, and do more exercise.

"\"Body fat\" refers to the proportion of fat in total body weight. In addition to lead to obesity, high body fat ratio can also increase the prevalence of many obesity diseases; while low body fat ratio may cause endocrine disorders.
Strong muscles + balanced body fat ratio will give you a good looking and fit body figure"

"\"Bone mass\" refers to the amount of calcium, phosphorus, and other matters contained in the bone. Women with less bone mass caused by weight loss or amenorrhoea should pay more attention especially.
Try to keep balanced intake of calcium, and take 15-minute sunbathing and 20-minute exercise every day."
"Current bone mass's too low. Try to keep balanced intake of calcium, take 15-minute sunbathing and 20-minute exercise every day"

"\"Muskuļu massa\" refers to the mass of skeletal and smooth muscles and other muscle tissues contained water.
Loss of muscle mass will result in a lower basal metabolism and reduce energy consumption, and you'll gain weight or fall ill more easily. More muscles is helpful to improve basal metabolism so as to reduce body fat"
"Tavas muskuļu massas diapazonam ir jābūt %s~%s. Tev vajag vē %s muskuļu massas. Ēd veselīgi un nodarbojies ar sportu."
"Your standard muscle ratio range should be %s~%s. You still need more muscles. Eat healthily and do more exercise. More muscles'll protect you better."
"You have a lower muscle ratio. Eat healthily and do more exercise. More muscles'll protect you better"
"Nevar analizēt miegu līdz Mi Bante nav sapārota"
"Can't calculate BMI for people younger than 7 years old"
"Can't calculate BMI for people shorter than 100cm"
"Can't calculate BMI for people younger than 18 years old"
"Can't analyse for people older than 80 years old"
"Can't analyse for people younger than 10 years old"
"Can't analyse for people taller than 225 cm"
"Can't analyse for people shorter than 100 cm"

Nevarēja dalīties, pārbaudiet, vai ir pietiekami daudz brīvas vietas
Jums nebūs iespējams atjaunot objektus pēc tam, kad tos dzēsīsiet.
Švaks GPS signāls. Pavirzieties kur nav nojumes.

Flight ratio is the share of the time you spend in the air without touching the ground as opposed to the overall step time. Step time is the combination of flight time and ground contact time. Flight ratio is an important criterion for measuring running efficiency.
Only smart shoes can analyze flight ratio
Kas var mēģināt piezemēties uz saviem purngaliem skrienot?
Mēs neiesakām mainīt savus skriešanas ieradumus. Ja izvēlaties piezemēties uz pēdu un papēdi, valkājiet apavus ar labāku polsterējumu, lai samazinātu ietekmi uz piezemēšanos.
Kad jūsu ceļgaliem nepieciešama papildu aizsardzība, jūs varat mēģināt piezemēšanos uz purngala sekojot zemākai norādei.
Pieskarieties zemei tieši zem jums, lai jūsu ceļgali ir nedaudz saliekti, sasveriet savu ķermeni uz priekšu.
Skrieniet itkā ar kājām grieztu karstu apli.
Pievienojiet skriešanas apavus un pārliecinieties, ka jūs piezemējaties uz purngala.
"Ieslēdziet Bluetooth un savieno ar apaviem pirms skriešanas. Saglabā Bluetooth ieslēgtu skrienot."
Striking the ground with your forefeet requires stronger calf muscles and Achilles tendons; landing on your midfeet or heels strongly affects your knees
Running shoes needed to display forefeet data

"When your knees require more protection, you can try landing on your forefeet more following the routine below.
1) Strike the ground right below you, keep your knees slightly bent, lean your body forward."
2) Run as if you were rotating a hot wheel with your feet.
3) Make smaller steps when you increase running speed

"Fasten the band as tightly as you feel comfortable. Wearing too tight or too loose will affect the heart rate results.
Wear the band slightly above the thinnest part of your wrist."
Mi Band Pulse un Mi Band 2 ir aprīkotas ar pulsa sensoru
Your exercise heart rate zone is calculated as below. Select the appropriate heart rate zone can significantly increase the exercise efficiency
Temps ir soļu skaits ko veici skrienot minūtes laikā.
Skrējēji parasti palielina soli, lai iegūtu ātrumu. Tomēr, izmantojot šo metodi var izraisīt muskuļu bojājumus. Jūs varat mēģināt palielināt savu tempu, lai iegūtu ātrumu.
Lielo attālumu skrējēji parasti veic 180 soļus minūtē. Mēs iesakām izmantot šo vērtību kā jūsu tempa mērķi.
Pievieno Mi Banti, pārliecinies, ka temps ir piefiksēts.
"Ieslēdz Bluetooth un pievieno Mi Banti pirms skriešanas. Saglabā Bluetooth ieslēgtu skrienot."
"Pace is one of the speed definitions generally used in a marathon. It's the time required for you to run 1 km."
Keep a uniform speed is the key, so steady curve in the Graph means you controlled well.
Pace can be measured easier. During a marathon, you can adjust your pace according to the split time of a certain distance
Why not use speed per hour?

Skrienot lēni, pārsvarā cilvēki piezemējas uz pēdas vai papēža. Kad skriešanas ātrums palielinās, tad daudzi piezemējas uz purngala. Piemēram, vairums sprinteri izvēlas skrienot piezemēties uz purngala.
Piezemējoties uz pēdas vai papēža smagi ietekmē ceļus. Piezemējoties uz purngala nepieciešami spēcīgāki ikri un Ahileja cīpsla
"Pace is one of the speed definitions generally used in a marathon. It's the time required for you to run 1 km."

"Tempo run needs a good control and plan of your physical strength. Strength distribution is the key to a long-distance running, and it depends on the pace you planned to have. With different speeds used, tempo run can divide into easy run, long run and lactate-threshold run, etc. A consistent and continuous speed is needed and beneficial to exert your strength fully in a marathon."
Stride means the distance covered by a step when walking or running.
Find the fittest stride of your own
Appropriate stride should be: landing on your midfeet or forefeet to make the landing point fall close to the center of gravity, and press down the foot backward to hold on to the ground.
Long-distance runners usually make 180 steps per minute. We recommend using this value as your step frequency goal.
Step frequency is the number of steps you make per minute when running.
Runners usually increase their stride to gain speed. However, using this method can result in muscle damage. You can try to increase your step frequency to gain speed.

For most amateur runners, slow step frequency and big stride will make the landing point of the feet fall in front of the center of gravity. Like braking, it will force you move backwards, thus bring poor energy efficiency and higher risks of injury.

"You are more likely to get injured when your feet stay in contact with the ground longer, as your body weight is applied to one of your feet for a more extended period of time.
Shorter contact time might lower the risk of injuries."
\"Ground contact time\" is the time your feet stay in contact with the ground. It decreases as you go faster.
Only smart shoes can analyze your ground contact time

"Keep your GCT between 160-200 ms.
Here's how you can keep it shorter: don't land on your heels, shorten your stride, and strengthen your Achilles tendons. Consult a position to get exercise recommendation for your Achilles tendons. Keep working on your running technique."
"Couldn't get info, pull down to refresh"

Restartē Bluetooth to Iestatījumos izslēdzot un ieslēdzot.
Lai noņemtu sapārojmuu, dodieties Mi Bante > Iestatījumi > Noņemt sapārojumu. Tad pāro ar savu ierīci vēlreiz.
Restartē ieŗīci un mēģini ar savu Banti atbloķēt to.

pacel roku, lai apskatītu laiku uz Mi Bantes

"\"Visceral fat\" refers to fat accumulated in the gap of internal organs. High visceral fat level will increase the risk of heart disease, hypertension, hyperlipidemia and other chronic disease.
Visceral fat accumulates easily but reduced hard. You need to maintain a balanced diet and keep aerobic exercise not less than 20 minutes every day"
Visceral fat level must be reduced to less than 9. Keep doing exercise and having balanced diet.
Current visceral fat level is too high. Doing exercise and having balanced diet can prevent a further increase
Izmanto to pašu kontu, lai apskatītu

"\"Water\" refers to the overall share of water in human body, including the water in your blood, lymph, and other bodily fluids. If you are losing weight, you should pay special attention to water consumption to avoid dehydration.
The measurements which are taken after you just bathed, drank alcohol, or worked out might not be accurate"
"Rapid weight loss is often the result of losing water together with fat. That's why measurements which are taken after you just bathed or worked out might not be accurate"
Stand barefoot on the sheet metal of the scale
